entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm near the river. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
